roleset.name: lasting indefinately, fixed

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that lasts

example.name: arg1
example.text: Her thyroid peroxidase antibody has come back positive and her thyroid stimulating immunoglobulin is negative , so this is most likely post-partum thyroiditis and it would be expected to resolve spontaneously over 6 - 12 weeks , possibly to enter a hypothyroid phase , which could be transient or permanent .

roleset.note: PERMANENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from permanent.01-j)
